definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
a monument/an upright stone tablet/stele/CL:塊|块[kuai4],面[mian4]

sentences.english: Rubbings have been made from the majority of stone tablets here.
sentences.chinese: 这座碑林里的大部分石碑都已经拓印完毕。

sentences.english: They venerate the Ventari Tablet as their most sacred artifact and testament.
sentences.chinese: 希尔瓦里人尊凡特里石碑为他们最重要的神器和圣约。

sentences.english: What's inscribed on this tablet is a weather forecast during the Shang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 这块石碑上刻的就是一则商朝的天气预报。

sentences.english: Wow, this stone tablet is quite old.
sentences.chinese: 哇，这块儿石碑可是有些年头儿。

sentences.english: This museum has a fine collection of steles, inscribed with ancient Chinese characters.
sentences.chinese: 这座博物馆收藏了刻有古老汉字的石碑珍品。

sentences.english: With such a long history, does this stele have a name?
sentences.chinese: 历史这么悠久，那这块石碑有名字吧？

sentences.english: I grab onto the slab with bloody hands and sway back and forth, trying to knock it loose.
sentences.chinese: 我用流着血的手抓住石碑，前后摇晃，想要使它松动。

sentences.english: His grave is marked by a fine stela.
sentences.chinese: 他的墓前有一块精致的石碑。

sentences.english: Are no mass graves exist, leaving only a stone, mass graves for the white mule monument.
sentences.chinese: 现冢无存，仅留石碑，传为白骡冢碑。

sentences.english: This is the Georgia Guidestones scenario - to reduce the world's population.
sentences.chinese: 这是佐治亚州石碑的版本，来减少世界人口。

sentences.english: This stele records how Christianity was treated in China in the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 这块石碑上面记载的是唐代时教传进中国的一些情况。

sentences.english: I've found a huge stone stele.
sentences.chinese: 我发现了一块巨大的石碑。

sentences.english: Copies of the edict were inscribed on stone monuments all over the empire.
sentences.chinese: 罗马帝国到处可见苍穹有力地刻有该法令的石碑。

sentences.english: Ancient tablets at the Yi Song Pavilion containing Yun Donju s poems have corroded.
sentences.chinese: 一松亭里刻有尹东柱诗句的石碑已被风雨侵蚀。

sentences.english: His name was blazoned on the stone.
sentences.chinese: 他的名字被刻在石碑上。

sentences.english: Look at this stele from the Northern Song Dynasty.

definition: stele/vertical stone tablet for carved inscriptions
a monument/an upright stone tablet/stele/CL:塊|块[kuai4],面[mian4]
a record of events inscribed on a tablet
the top part of a tablet
